returnType: The VSIZE function returns a numeric value. If expression is NULL, then the VSIZE function returns NULL.
description: The Oracle/PLSQL VSIZE function returns the number of bytes in the internal representation of an expression.
sample:
VSIZE('Tech on the net')
Result: 15

VSIZE('Tech on the net ')
Result: 16

VSIZE(null)
Result: <null>

VSIZE('')
Result: <null>

VSIZE(' ')
Result: 1
